creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: profile of white crane facing R, beak partially open, head pointed toward UR; light blue-grey water with darker blue ripples; black cattails and reeds at LL, grey reeds in middle and background
inscription: Signature, Title, and Marks, and Label
markings: LLC, in pencil: [137/150]; on back, LRC, in pencil: [SFA 54]; on back of mount, label from Shogun Gallery
signed: LRC, in pencil: [Aikins]; bottom center, in pencil: [Moon Call]
title: Moon Call
